product-summary-buy-button.title: Product Summary (Buy Button)
product-summary-buy-button.markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-product-summary-productsummarybuybutton

Product Summary is an app responsible for summarizing product information (such as name, price and image) in other store blocks, such as the Shelf and the Minicart.

Renders the Buy Button.

![Warning](https://developers.vtex.com/img/emojis/warning.png|width=12px) Notice that this block should only be configured if your store still uses the [Minicart v1](https://github.com/vtex-apps/minicart/blob/383d7bbd3295f06d1b5854a0add561a872e1515c/docs/README.md). When using the [Minicart v2](https://vtex.io/docs/components/all/vtex.minicart/), you should configure the [**Add To Cart Button**](https://vtex.io/docs/components/all/vtex.add-to-cart-button/) instead.

`"vtex.product-summary@2.x"`

title.markdownDescription: Define a custom name. It will be shown in site editor for faster identification.

children.markdownDescription: Declare the blocks that must be wrapped inside the current one.

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.

blockClass.markdownDescription:
`string | string[]`

Block container class. This prop’s set value functions as a block identifier for CSS customizations.

isOneClickBuy.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

Whether the user should be redirected to Checkout after clicking on the Buy Button (`true`) or not (`false`).

buyButtonText.markdownDescription:
`string`

Custom text that overwrites the default Buy Button text.

displayBuyButton.markdownDescription:
`enum`

Sets the Buy Button display mode

oneOf.markdownDescription: It will always be displayed
Only displayed on hover
It will be hidden for users

customToastURL.markdownDescription:
`string`

Defines a redirect link to the Toast displayed when an item is added to your cart.

buyButtonBehavior.markdownDescription:
`enum`

Sets the Buy Button behavior when it is clicked on.

oneOf.markdownDescription: Redirect users to the product page
Redirect users to the minicart
Add the selected SKU to the minicart. Use it only if there are SKU Selectors for each product variation. This way, users can properly select their desired SKU.

product-summary-image.title: Product Summary (Image)
product-summary-image.markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-product-summary-productsummaryimage

Product Summary is an app responsible for summarizing product information (such as name, price and image) in other store blocks, such as the Shelf and the Minicart.

Renders the product image.

`"vtex.product-summary@2.x"`

title.markdownDescription: Define a custom name. It will be shown in site editor for faster identification.

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.

blockClass.markdownDescription:
`string | string[]`

Block container class. This prop’s set value functions as a block identifier for CSS customizations.

showBadge.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

Whether a discount badge (if there is any) will be displayed on the product's image (`true`) or not (`false`)

badgeText.markdownDescription:
`string`

Text displayed on the discount badge (in case the badge is configured to be displayed on the image).

showCollections.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

Whether collection badges (if there are any) will be displayed (`true`) or not (`false`).

displayMode.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

Defines the Product Summary Image display mode. Possible values are: `normal` and `inline`.

placeholder.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

Defines the Product Summary Image placeholder image.

mainImageLabel.markdownDescription:
`string | object`

Matches the value defined in the `imageLabel` field from the admin's Catalog. Once matched, it defines which product image will be the main image displayed in the Product Summary component.

label.markdownDescription:
`string`

Text value that matches the value defined in the `imageLabel` field from the admin's Catalog. Once matched, it defines which product image will be the main image displayed in the Product Summary component. If you set a label and no match is found, the main image of the product will be shown instead.

labelMatchCriteria.markdownDescription:
`enum`

Criteria to define if the image's `label` searched value should be exactly as provided or if it just needs to contain the substring anywhere in the image's label.

oneOf.markdownDescription: Finds the image that matches exactly the string filled in `label` field
Finds the first image that contains the substring filled in `label` field

hoverImage.markdownDescription:
`object`

Defines which criteria should be used to define the hover image according to the product images in the admin's Catalog.

criteria.markdownDescription:
`enum`

Criteria that should be used to define the hover image according to the product images in the admin's Catalog.

oneOf.markdownDescription: The hover image will be the one that matches the `label` value
The hover image should be the one with the same `index` value

labelMatchCriteria.markdownDescription:
`enum`

Criteria to define if the image's `label` searched value should be exactly as provided or if it just needs to contain the substring anywhere in the image's `label`. *Caution:* This prop should only be used when the `criteria` prop is set as `label`.

oneOf.markdownDescription: Finds the image that matches exactly the string filled in `label` field
Finds the first image that contains the substring filled in `label` field

label.markdownDescription:
`string`

Text string to match the desired image's `label` value. If no match is found, no image will be displayed during the hover. *Caution:* This prop should only be used when the `criteria` prop is set as `label`.

index.markdownDescription:
`number`

Index number to match with the desired image's. If no match is found, no image will be displayed during the hover. *Caution:* This prop should only be used when the `criteria` prop is set as `index`.

hoverImageLabel.markdownDescription:
`string`

![Deprecated](https://img.shields.io/badge/-Deprecated-red) Text value that matches the value defined in the `imageLabel` field from the admin's Catalog. Once matched, it defines which product image will be displayed when the user is hovering. If you set a label and no match is found, no image will be displayed during the hover. *Caution:* Use the `hoverImage` prop instead.

width.markdownDescription:
`object`

Defines the Product Summary Image width.

mobile.markdownDescription:
`number`

Image width for mobile device users.

height.markdownDescription:
`object`

Defines the Product Summary Image height.

mobile.markdownDescription:
`number`

Image height for mobile device users.

aspectRatio.markdownDescription:
`object`

Aspect ratio of the Product Summary Image. It defines whether the image should be displayed in a square, portrait, landscape or in another format. The prop value should follow the [common aspect ratio notation](https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Aspect_ratio_(image)), which gives two numbers separated by a colon. For example: `1:1` for a square format or `3:4` for an upright portrait. Note that this prop won't work if you've already configured the `width` or `height` props.

desktop.markdownDescription:
`string`

Image aspect ratio for desktop users.

mobile.markdownDescription:
`string`

Image aspect ratio for mobile device users.

maxHeight.markdownDescription:
`object`

Defines the Product Summary Image max height. Note that this prop won't work if you've already configured the `width` or `height` props.

desktop.markdownDescription:
`string`

Image maximum height for desktop users.

mobile.markdownDescription:
`string`

Image maximum height for mobile device users.

shelf.relatedProducts.title: Related Products Shelf
shelf.relatedProducts.markdownDescription:
https://developers.vtex.com/vtex-developer-docs/docs/vtex-shelf#related-products-shelf
`nRelatedProducts` is a subtype of a Shelf block (`shelf.relatedProduct`) that queries and displays the related products on a Product Details Page. It can therefore only be declared in a product template (`store.product`).

`"vtex.product-summary@2.x"`

title.markdownDescription: Define a custom name. It will be shown in site editor for faster identification.

blocks.markdownDescription: Declare the blocks that must be wrapped inside the current one.

props.markdownDescription: All available properties for this block.

blockClass.markdownDescription:
`string | string[]`

Block container class. This prop’s set value functions as a block identifier for CSS customizations.

recommendation.markdownDescription:
`enum`

Type of recommendations that will be displayed in the Shelf. Possible values: `similars`, `suggestions`, `accessories` (these first three depend on the product's data given in the admin's catalog) and `view`, `buy`, `viewandBought` (These 3 are automatically generated according to the store’s activity)

hideOutOfStockItems.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

Whether out of stock items should be hidden (`true`) or not (`false`)

maxItems.markdownDescription:
`number`

Maximum number of items in the Shelf.

scroll.markdownDescription:
`enum`

Slide transition scroll type. Possible values: `BY_PAGE`, `ONE_BY_ONE`

arrows.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

If the arrows are displayable or not.

showTitle.markdownDescription:
`boolean`

If a title should be displayed in the Shelf or not.

minItemsPerPage.markdownDescription:
`number`

Minimum amount of Shelf slides. This prop can be used to control how many itens will be displayed on the Shelf even in the smallest screen size. Its value can be a **float**, which means that you can choose a multiple of 0.5 to indicate that you want to show a "peek" of the next slide on the Shelf.

itemsPerPage.markdownDescription:
`number`

Maximum amount of Shelf slides. This prop can be used to control how many itens will be displayed on the Shelf even in the biggest screen size. Its value can be a **float**, which means that you can choose a multiple of 0.5 to indicate that you want to show a "peek" of the next slide on the Shelf.
